sentences.en: "Ecological" has become one of the most overworked adjectives among manufacturers of garden supplies.
sentences.cn: “生态的”这个词已经成为园艺产品生产商用得最滥的形容词之一。

sentences.en: All these measures have played active roles in improving China's ecological environment.
sentences.cn: 这些措施对于改善中国的生态环境起到了积极作用.

sentences.en: Each animal has its ecological niche.
sentences.cn: 每种动物都有自己的生态位.

sentences.en: Forest entomologists have concentrated on ecological problems.
sentences.cn: 森林昆虫学家所重视的是生态问题.

sentences.en: Global ecological efforts can easily be at odds with local ecologies.
sentences.cn: 全球性生态保护工作很可能会和地方生态系统存在矛盾。

sentences.en: Large dams have harmed Siberia's delicate ecological balance.
sentences.cn: 大型水坝对西伯利亚脆弱的生态平衡造成了破坏。

sentences.en: New systems must maximize the role of ecological mechanisms and emphasize the use of renewable resources.
sentences.cn: 新的系统应发挥生态机制的作用并重视可更新资源的利用.

sentences.en: Scientists have described the Aral sea as the site of the worst ecological disaster on earth.
sentences.cn: 科学家把咸海描述成地球上最严重的生态灾难发生地。

sentences.en: Species occupying the same ecological niches in the same areas usually do not cross.
sentences.cn: 在同一地区占有同样生态生境的两个种通常不杂交.

sentences.en: The ecological disaster is partly a product of letting everything rip in order to increase production.
sentences.cn: 出现生态灾难的部分原因是人们为了增产而不惜一切代价。

sentences.en: The ecological setting acts as a stage for evolutionary processes.
sentences.cn: 生态的布景可作为进化过程的舞台.

sentences.en: The region has been declared an ecological disaster zone.
sentences.cn: 这个地区已经宣布为生态灾难区.

sentences.en: Two main types can be distinguished: ecoclines ( clines along an ecological gradient ).
sentences.cn: 有两个主要类型可以区分,即生态梯度变异 ( 即沿着生态梯度出现的梯度变异 ).

sentences.en: We risk upsetting the ecological balance of the area.
sentences.cn: 我们有可能破坏这个地区的生态平衡。

sentences.en: We too often fail to apply basic ecological principles.
sentences.cn: 我们都太不注意运用基本的生态学原则.

phrases.tran_cn: 生态效率；生态效应；生态等值
生态治理；符合生态原则的管理

trans.tran_cn: 生态（学）的，关注生态环境的
trans.tran_en: connected with the way plants, animals, and people are related to each other and to their environment
